Package uk.knightz.knightzapi.communication.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Server
    Represents an external server, running the KnightzAPI Web API.
    ServerFactory
    An abstract Factory responsible for creating new Server objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ServerFactory.FactoryStorage
    Stores the current ServerFactory instance
    ServerManager
    Manages the current running Webserver
    SimpleServer
    Implementation of Server
    Webserver
    The Main Webserver of the Web API.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NotAServerException
    Thrown if a handshake with an external server fails by the external server not returning status 201 or providing an invalid public key for encryption
